title: TRAX Release {rel_ver}
description:
We wanted to inform you that we are scheduling a maintenance window for our TRAX application, Release {rel_ver}. This maintenance is essential to address identified defects and enhance the overall user experience.

During this scheduled maintenance period, the TRAX application will be temporarily unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and assure you that our team will work diligently to minimize downtime.

Reason for Maintenance:

Addressing Defects: Our team will be resolving identified defects to ensure smoother functionality.
Enhancing User Experience: We are implementing updates aimed at enhancing the overall user experience and improving performance.

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation during this maintenance period. Should you have any urgent concerns or queries, please feel free to contact our support team through the helpdesk support portal.

Thank you for your patience and continued support.

Sincerely,

Kore Solutions

teams_integrated.Ï•comment: tenant_id: is the .webhook file name that holds the dictionary of teams webhooks

teams_message.Title: TRAX Release {rel_ver} (HTS ON+, HTS Texas, Kehoe, AirCom and EJS)
teams_message.Notes: Thank you everyone for all your efforts and hard work!
